channel.title: Port Forwarding on Wifi Only?
channel.description: Would this work to host a server from my laptop when it's wifi only? I've been trying all last night but I can't get it to work.

item.title: Port Forwarding on Wifi Only?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

alright thanks for the info, and yes I do caution anybody who messes with others wifi’s. After the hackers started using wifi to steal identity back in the late 1990’s they did make a law about entering others wifi networks.

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding on Wifi Only?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Loveandpower:

Interesting xD, would they be able to kick the players in anyway (obviously they could delete the port forwarding/change info )

The only thing I guess they could do is kick you off/ ban you off their wi-fi. Not sure if they could sue you for this though.

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding on Wifi Only?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:451399”]Well a while back I was leeching from kfc xD

Could I theoretically portforward their router if I knew the login details? What ip would I use? Would I use my ip? Or would I have to find out a LAN ip?[/quote]
Well you’d use the IP of your laptop, and if you knew all the login details you might be able to host it off of theirs, unless they had a router that couldn’t support things like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding on Wifi Only?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I host my servers on my laptop, so yeah they do, plus it’s the wrong section to be asking this.

Edit:
I believe you have to change the port forwarding settings so that the IP that is port forwarding is the one of your laptops. Plus on my router, two different things can’t share two ports, so I also had to remove another one first.

Read full topic
